channel.title: Need an Experienced Coder
channel.description:
Hi, im hiring an experienced coder to do full-time coding for my server ill be paying with admin position on the server the source is project czar needs to be able to: add npcs and drops shops ( i can do this just want someone better) add new silab items into item file and WORK edit client to make commands and so on just message me or something and well talk
*EDIT* lol alright valid points all of you then would anyone like to make a server with me 50-50 and be an owner aswell
and delta out of all the people i never thought id hear from you again hows your server going (btw this is benj if you remember me from long ago)

item.title: Need an Experienced Coder
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Your Not Offering A Real Insentive For Someone To Code For You… If All They Are Getting Is Admin… Like Delta Said, They Could Code Their Own Server. ;D

You Could Consider Making It Into A Project And Have Multiple Coders And A Forum Community… Or You Could Offer A Payment…
